attributes.action: Tax relief on carbon neutral home improvements
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IF the government is really serious about climate change, why not make eco friendly home improvements, solar panels, wind turbines, home insulation, rain water collection etc VAT AND TAX free.  This could be paid for in the same way as you can buy a bicycle tax-free on the ride to work scheme and payments made though your wages via your employer…
